title: London/Holborn-Clerkenwell
name: The Honorable Society of Lincoln's Inn
image: https://en.wikivoyage.org/wiki/File:Gateway to Lincoln's Inn, off Lincoln's Inn.jpeg
content: Like Gray's Inn, one the of the four societies of the bar. The wonderful old buildings here are arranged around the open spaces of Lincoln's Inn Fields and a walk around this area will give any visitor a real sense of the history and grand traditions of the legal profession in London. | image=Gateway to Lincoln's Inn, off Lincoln's Inn.jpeg
